comments.content:
[Neutraface Bold Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20090731144234/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface)

[Please use a descriptive title next time.](http://web.archive.org/web/20090731144234/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2)

Thanks guy.

I am a bit of a font novice so was not sure how to properly title this one. I will try harder next time!

Hi Christopher,

even a simple ‘Gallery’ would have made your thread stand out from the crowd. Alternatively, something like ‘Sans-serif caps with low A bar’ … It’s always a good idea to mention the source, e.g. ‘Acme Gallery website’.  
Thanks!
